product_title: Windo Slim Fit Dobby Short Sleeve Button-Up Shirt
product_description: Neatly patterned and textured fabric with a dash of stretch styles this short-sleeve shirt styled with a crisp hidden-button collar and webbed cuff accents.
product_details_and_care:
Neatly patterned and textured fabric with a dash of stretch styles this short-sleeve shirt styled with a crisp hidden-button collar and webbed cuff accents.
29" length; 41" chest (size 3)
98% cotton, 2% elastane
Machine wash, line dry
Imported
Item #6030264
product_size_info:
Runs small; order one size up.
Ted Baker Slim Fit is considered an Extra Slim fit; fitted close to the body all over.
